text: The first Lee Know Music Core with STAY in the audience.
[Did you eat lunch? Don't forget to eat] Did you eat lunch?
We just finished our first dance practice
and I'm on my way home.
We learned the whole choreo on the first day
After our first day of dance practice
[(Having a drink because I'm hungry)] and because I'm hungry...
The sound can be misleading but it's Coke Zero.
I heard they released W**ch's Zero. Where's my phone though?
There was slight blandness to the sweetness
but Seungmin said it was good.
Why am I so bad at talking?
This feels like we're talking over a drink.
[(Wait, it's my first time showing you my room, right?)]
There's not much to my room.
I cuddle up with this when I sleep.
Tomorrow I'm going to dye my hair.
[(Thinking through what I'll do tomorrow)] Dye my hair, work out...
I'm going to go to bed now.
But because the first practice went well yesterday
I'm expecting today to go well too.
a lot of people are coming tomorrow,
so I think it'll be fun
but first I'll do my best
[(It's finally the day of Show! Music Core)]
[(I'm nervous, I think I'm more nervous than when we did "Walk")]
It's been so long since the studio's been packed like this.
[(It's so nice to see you like this)]
[(But the more I look, the more I'm getting nervous...)]
I hope we can do the rehearsal soon.
[(I'm going to do better in the final pre-recording)]
[(I wasn't planning on being this cute)]
[(I can't help but be in charge of the cuteness)]
[(But STAY... You didn't do the STAY pose?)] You seriously didn't do this?
[(We should talk later)] That's no good.
[(Said thank you to the dancers)] Well done today!
[(And then there's the people I need to say my greetings to)]
[There is a good jjajangmyeon place nearby]
[It was next to an auto shop, but I don't remember]
[(They told me they didn't eat lunch, so I recommended a restaurant)]
The shouts from STAY were so loud
We trained them well at our concerts.
And I asked if you guys did the STAY pose,
but no one said they did.
But I did it at the Dispatch D'FESTA.
I don't know why this fell.
[(Just looking at this fills up my heart)]
They're the letters you sent me!
[(I'm writing the message for the bracelet I'll give to STAY next week)]
[(Next week, please eat lunch before you get here)]
[Did you eat lunch? Don't forget to eat]
[(I can't tell you now! I'll show you if you come next week!)]
[(I saw that STAY were wearing these too)]
[(It would be nice if all STAY could come here together)]
"Welcome. It's your first time in Lee Know Music Core, right?"
[(I'll go do the script-reading then the broadcast!)]
[(Today's Lee Know Music Core was fun!)]
